sentences.en: A real pizza oven gives better results than an ordinary home oven.
sentences.cn: 专门的比萨烤箱比普通家用烤箱效果更好。

sentences.en: As soon as the cake is done, remove it from the oven.
sentences.cn: 蛋糕一烤好就从炉子里取出来。

sentences.en: Bake in the preheated oven for 25 minutes or until golden brown.
sentences.cn: 在预热过的烤箱里烤25分钟，或烤成金黄色。

sentences.en: Grease two sturdy baking sheets and heat the oven to 400 degrees.
sentences.cn: 在两块结实的烤板上抹些油，把烤炉加热到400度。

sentences.en: Heat the oven to 400 degrees F.
I've put some sesame crackers in the oven to bake.
sentences.cn: 我已经把几片芝麻脆饼放进烤箱里烤了。

sentences.en: Most of the food is cooked on a large wood-fired oven.
sentences.cn: 大部分食物都是在一口很大的烧柴土灶上烹煮的。

sentences.en: Preheat the oven to 200 degrees C.
Press the mixture onto the bread and bake in a hot oven for ten minutes.
sentences.cn: 把混合料抹在面包上，然后在烤箱内高温烘烤10分钟。

sentences.en: Set the oven at gas mark 4.
She lit the oven, preparatory to putting the pie into it.
sentences.cn: 她把烤箱加热，准备把馅饼放进去。

sentences.en: She percolated the coffee and put croissants in the oven to warm.
sentences.cn: 她滤煮好咖啡，然后把羊角面包放进烤箱加热。

sentences.en: Take the cake out of the oven.
sentences.cn: 把蛋糕从烤箱中取出来吧。

sentences.en: The oven burners reignite automatically if blown out.
sentences.cn: 烤炉的火如果吹灭了会自动再点燃。

sentences.en: You'll be amazed at the culinary creations possible in a Dutch oven.
sentences.cn: 荷兰烤箱能够做的食物之多会让你感到惊奇。

phrases.tran_cn: 真空干燥箱，真空烘箱；真空电炉

trans.tran_en: a piece of equipment that food is cooked inside, shaped like a metal box with a door on the front
